result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jesse Glen Skytland

defendant.name: Skytland, Jesse Glen

records.addlTxt:
1:02 PM Defendant Jesse Glen Skytland in court.  Attorney Peter Michael Masana in court for Jesse Glen Skytland.  Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Masana states matters are not yet resolved.  Requests prelim in 22CF534 and asks that 22CM345 track for plea hearing.  Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on December 15, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Petition to Modify Bond Granted - lift no contact
No contact w/S.L.C. or A.N.S. May retrieve your belongings from Motel 6 before Sept. 19th if accompanied by a law enforcement officer upon prior notice, one time.

3:03 PM Defendant Jesse Glen Skytland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Janae F. Hochmuth appeared by video for Jesse Glen Skytland.  Prosecuting attorney Gabriel David Arevalo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Advised of rights to an attorney.  DE does not qualify for PD representation.  DE requests Atty Masana be appointed to this case.  Court appoints Atty. Peter Masana.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  State recommends a signature bond.  No objection from Atty Hochmuth.  Atty Hochmuth requests DE be allowed to return to his residence.  $2,500.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows: No contact with S.L.C., or A.N.S.  DE may not return to the Motel 6 on Moon Road before September 19, 2022.
Return date scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 30, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Return date on October 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
